name: Fully Flighted
summary: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
description:
You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes. This includes the status bonus to your Speed if you have Fledgling Flight.Traits

Strix: Winged humanoids, most of whom live in and around Cheliax.
